label.value: microarray assay

definition.value: An analyte assay where binding of the analyte to immobilized matrix is measured.

label.value: immunohistochemistry

definition.value: An immunostaining assay to detect and potentially localize antigens within the cells of a tissue section.

label.value: assay measuring the association constant [KA] of a MHC:ligand complex

definition.value: A MHC binding constant determination assay measuring equilibrium association constant (KA).

label.value: assay measuring the dissociation constant [KD] of a MHC:ligand complex

definition.value: A MHC binding constant determination assay measuring equilibrium dissociation constant (KD).

label.value: radioactivity detection assay measuring equilibrium dissociation constant [KD] to determine competitive binding of a purified-MHC:ligand complex

definition.value: A radioactivity detection assay that measures equilibrium dissociation constant (KD) to detect the loss of binding of a known reference ligand to purified-MHC due to competition by the ligand under investigation.

label.value: assay measuring the half life of a MHC:ligand complex

definition.value: A MHC binding constant determination assay measuring half life of binding.

label.value: assay measuring the half maximal effective concentration [EC50] of a MHC:ligand complex

definition.value: A MHC binding constant determination assay measuring half maximal effective concentration (EC50).

label.value: assay measuring the half maximal inhibitory concentration [IC50] of a MHC:ligand complex

definition.value: A MHC binding constant determination assay measuring half maximal inhibitory concentration (IC50).

label.value: assay measuring the off rate measurement [koff] of a MHC:ligand complex

definition.value: A MHC binding constant determination assay measuring binding off rate measurement data item (koff).

label.value: assay measuring the MHC ligand binding on rate [kon] of a MHC:ligand complex

definition.value: A MHC binding constant determination assay measuring binding on rate (kon).

label.value: chromatography assay measuring the association constant [KA] of a B cell epitope:antibody complex

definition.value: An analytical chromatography assay that measures the association constant [KA] of an antigen binding with an antibody.

label.value: chromatography assay measuring the dissociation constant [KD] of a B cell epitope:antibody complex

definition.value: An analytical chromatography assay that measures the dissociation constant [KD] of an antigen binding with an antibody.

label.value: hydrogen/deuterium exchange footprinting assay measuring binding of a B cell epitope:antibody complex

definition.value: A hydrogen/deuterium exchange footprinting assay that detects the binding of an antigen with an antibody.

label.value: immunohistochemistry assay measuring binding of a B cell epitope:antibody complex

definition.value: A immunohistochemistry assay that detects the binding of an antigen with an antibody.

label.value: 3D molecular structure determination assay of a T cell epitope:MHC:TCR complex

definition.value: A 3D structure determination of bound molecular complex assay that characterizes the 3-dimensional structure of a T cell epitope:MHC:TCR complex.

label.value: DNA methylation profiling by ChIP-chip assay

definition.value: An epigenetic modification assay that identifies sites of DNA methylation using ChIP-chip technologies.

label.value: transcription profiling by MPSS assay

definition.value: A transcription profiling assay that uses Massive Parallel Signature Sequencing (MPSS).

label.value: histone modification identification by ChIP-chip assay

definition.value: An epigenetic modification assay that identifies regions containing specific histones and their modifications using ChIP-chip techniques.

label.value: histone modification identification by ChIP-Seq assay

definition.value: An epigenetic modification assay that identifies regions containing specific histones and their modifications using ChIP-Seq techniques.

label.value: transcription factor binding site identification by ChIP-chip assay

definition.value: A transcription factor binding site assay that utilizes ChIP-chip technology.

label.value: transcription factor binding site identification by ChIP-Seq assay

definition.value: A transcription factor binding site assay that utilizes ChIP-seq technology.

label.value: epigenetic modification assay

definition.value: An assay that identifies epigenetic modifications including histone modifications, open chromatin, and DNA methylation.

label.value: serial analysis of gene expression assay

definition.value: A transcription profiling assay that quantifies RNA through creating short signature tags of the messages and ligating them into a larger molecule than was sequenced.

label.value: genotyping by tiling array assay

definition.value: A genotyping by array assay that uses tiling array technology.

label.value: genotyping by SNP array assay

definition.value: A genotyping by array assay that uses SNP array technology.

label.value: parallel analysis of RNA structure assay

definition.value: A single-nucleotide-resolution nucleic acid structure mapping assay that performs simultaneous in vitro profiling of the secondary structure of thousands of RNA species at single nucleotide resolution using enzymatic probing based on deep sequencing fragments of RNAs that were treated with structure-specific enzymes

label.value: translation-associated transcript leader sequencing assay

definition.value: An RNA-seq assay that combines TL-seq with polysome fractionation

label.value: transcript leader sequencing assay

definition.value: An RNA-seq assay that combines enzymatic capture of m(7)G-capped mRNA 5' ends with high-throughput sequencing.

label.value: peptide mass fingerprinting assay

definition.value: A mass spectrometry assay that measures the absolute mass of the cleaved peptides derived from an unknown protein of interest. These masses are then compared to values for known protein sequences to identify the unknown protein.

label.value: array based nucleic acid structure mapping assay

definition.value: An assay which aims to provide information about the in vivo organization/structure of nucleic acids using chemical or enzymatic probes using a microarray.

label.value: micrococcal nuclease digestion followed by tiling array assay

definition.value: An array based nucleic acid structure mapping assay that identifies nucleosome positions genome wide, by detection of regions protected by nucleosomes from digestion by micrococal nuclease using tiling array assays

label.value: ribosomal profiling by sequencing assay

definition.value: A RNA-seq assay that sequences only mRNA protected by the ribosome during translation.

label.value: assay for transposase-accessible chromatin using sequencing

definition.value: An assay to capture the location of open chromatin, DNA-binding proteins, individual nucleosomes and chromatin compaction at nucleotide resolution by Tn5 transposase insertion.

label.value: chromatin isolation by RNA purification sequencing assay

definition.value: A detection of specific nucleic acids with complementary probes assay that measures regions of the genome which are bound by a specific RNA (or a by a ribonucleoprotein containing the RNA of interest) using high-throughput sequencing.

label.value: self-transcribing active regulatory region sequencing assay

definition.value: An RNA-seq assay that identifies the sequences that act as transcriptional enhancers in a direct, quantitative, and genome-wide manner from sheared genomic DNA.

label.value: carbon-copy chromosome conformation capture assay followed by sequencing assay

definition.value: A carbon-copy chromosome conformation capture assay to analyze the organization of chromosomes in an unbiased, genome-wide manner using high throughput sequening following carbon-copy chromosome conformation capture.

label.value: individual-nucleotide resolution cross-linking and immunoprecipitation sequencing assay

definition.value: A cross-linking immunoprecipitation high-throughput sequencing assay that identifies protein-RNA interactions using UV light to covalently bind proteins and RNA molecules, allowing for a very stringent purification of the linked protein-RNA complexes.

label.value: RNA Bind-n-Seq assay

definition.value: An RNA-seq assay that comprehensively characterizes sequence and structural specificity of RNA binding proteins (RBPs).

label.value: polyA-site sequencing assay

definition.value: A RNA-seq assay that quantitatively profiles RNA polyadenylation at the transcriptome level.

label.value: 3D molecular structure determination assay of a MHC:ligand complex

definition.value: A 3D structure determination of bound molecular complex assay that characterizes the 3-dimensional structure of a MHC:ligand complex.

label.value: in vivo assay measuring B cell epitope specific protection from infectious challenge based on pathogen burden

definition.value: An in vivo assay measuring B cell epitope specific protection from pathogen challenge using pathogen burden.

label.value: in vivo assay measuring B cell epitope specific protection after tumor burden challenge

definition.value: An in vivo assay measuring B cell epitope specific protection from tumor challenge using tumor burden.

label.value: microarray assay measuring binding of a B cell epitope:antibody complex

definition.value: A microarray assay that detects the binding of an antigen with an antibody.

label.value: NMR assay measuring the dissociation constant [KD] of a B cell epitope:antibody complex

definition.value: A B cell epitope equilibrium dissociation constant (KD) determination assay that uses a nuclear magnetic resonance assay.

label.value: assay measuring biological activity resulting from T cell epitope:MHC:TCR binding

definition.value: A T cell epitope recognition assay that measures the immune response process resulting from the binding of a T cell receptor to epitope or the recongition of the epitope.

label.value: assay measuring epitope specific chemokine (C-C motif) ligand 17 production by T cells

definition.value: A T cell epitope specific cytokine production assay that detects production of chemokine (C-C motif) ligand 17 production by T cells.

label.value: assay measuring epitope specific macrophage migration inhibitory factor (MIF) production by T cells

definition.value: A T cell epitope specific cytokine production assay that detects macrophage migration inhibitory factor (MIF) production by T cells.

label.value: assay measuring epitope specific oncostatin M production by T cells

definition.value: A T cell epitope specific cytokine production assay that detects oncostatin M production by T cells.

label.value: assay measuring a binding constant of a T cell epitope:MHC:TCR complex

definition.value: A T cell epitope recognition assay that quantitavely characterizes the binding of a TCR with a ligand by determining a binding constant.

label.value: detection of specific nucleic acids with complementary probes assay measuring epitope specific chemokine (C-C motif) ligand 17 production by T cells

definition.value: A detection of specific nucleic acid polymers with complementary probes that detects chemokine (C-C motif) ligand 17 production by T cells.
